Articles.Content:
It doesnt have a cargo space but it does have some serius range / lifting power.

I recently started youtubing and this is my first video: (showcasing my Hercelus)

More information and how it looks is seen in the video. Go to youtube video by pressing the youtube button. Leaving a like/comment helps me alot.

Im looking for help in making better videos

.craft download will be availible if anyone wants it

The real C130 Hercules performing a similar method of takeoff (JATO):

Why do they call it Jet-Assisted Takeoff anyway? They're rockets, not jets.
Well my hercelus just got inspired by c130. Its not ment to be a replica. Maybe with b9 i could make a better one. But meh i like stock
